name: Nekros Prime
description: Death's new master. Featuring altered mod polarities allow for greater customization.

passive.description: A master of death, Nekros regenerates 5 points of Health any time an enemy dies within 10 meters of him. His passive also can heal Companions.

first.name: Soul Punch
first.desc: A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.

second.name: Terrify
second.desc: Casts fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.

third.name: Desecrate
third.desc: Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.

fourth.name: Shadows of the Dead
fourth.desc: Summons shadow versions of vanquished enemies to fight alongside you for a short period of time.

name: Nezha Prime
description: Behold: the Scion of the Burning Wind, now before you in most courtly accoutrement. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: Nezha slides 60% faster and goes 35% farther.

first.name: Fire Walker
first.desc: Blaze a trail of flames, scorching enemies and cleansing allies.

second.name: Blazing Chakram
second.desc: Hurl a flaming ring that burns enemies and causes them to emit a healing blast on death. Reactivate to instantly travel to the ring's location.

third.name: Warding Halo
third.desc: Create a protective ring of fire that also stuns and damage enemies who get too close.

fourth.name: Divine Spears
fourth.desc: Impale nearby enemies on spears that erupt from the ground.

name: Nidus Prime
description: Mutation is endless. The ravening plague-bearer returns in a long-unseen form, seething with a primal strain of the Infestation. Features altered Mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: The Infestation dwelling within Nidus mutates rapidly when used against his foes, fueling his abilities and yielding various symbiotic benefits.

first.name: Virulence
first.desc: Rupture the ground with a damaging fungal growth that steals energy from each enemy it strikes. For every five enemies hit, the Infestation mutates, multiplying its destructive force.

second.name: Larva
second.desc: Spawn an Infested pod that erupts with tendrils, latches onto nearby enemies and pulls them in.

third.name: Parasitic Link
third.desc: Bind to a target with a parasitic link. For allies, both the host and Nidus gain increased Ability Strength. Linked enemies take the damage inflicted on Nidus.

fourth.name: Ravenous
fourth.desc: Gluttonous maggots swarm nearby enemies, feasting until they burst with Infestation. The maggots benefit from Mutation and each enemy consumed adds to the Mutation stack.

name: Nova Prime
description: Nova Prime wreaks devastation on her enemies using volatile anti-matter. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: Whenever Nova is knocked down, she emits a neutron burst which knocks down and damages enemies in a 6 meter radius and deals 250 Blast damage.

first.name: Null Star
first.desc: Creates anti-matter particles that orbit Nova and seek nearby targets.

second.name: Antimatter Drop
second.desc: Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision.

third.name: Worm Hole
third.desc: Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.

fourth.name: Molecular Prime
fourth.desc: Primes all enemies in a radius with anti-matter.

name: Nyx Prime
description: Infiltrate the minds of your enemies with Nyx Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: Enemies are 20% less accurate when targeting Nyx (except while Absorb is active).

first.name: Mind Control
first.desc: Nyx invades the psyche of a target, confusing enemies and making them fight for the Tenno cause.

second.name: Psychic Bolts
second.desc: Nyx launches a cluster of force bolts at enemies, using telekinesis to adjust flight paths and seek nearby targets.

third.name: Chaos
third.desc: With a powerful psychic blast, Nyx causes mass hysteria on the battlefield by confusing all enemies to attack random factions.

fourth.name: Absorb
fourth.desc: Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge. Nyx's Weapon damage is buffed based on incoming absorbed damage when the Ability ends.

name: Oberon Prime
description: Protect the balance with this regal forest guardian. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: Creatures of nature rejuvenate in Oberon's presence, causing allied Kubrows, Kavats, Predasites, and Vulpaphylas to receive +25% Health, Shield and Armor links. Oberon's own Kubrow, Kavat, Predasite, or Vulpaphyla also receives 1 instant revive per mission.

first.name: Smite
first.desc: Focuses deadly energy within a target and then projects it outwards, damaging both the target and surrounding enemies.

second.name: Hallowed Ground
second.desc: Sanctifies the ground before Oberon with righteous fire, inflicting damage to any enemy that stands in the flames.

third.name: Renewal
third.desc: Healing waves of energy flow outward from Oberon to his allies, regenerating health over time.

fourth.name: Reckoning
fourth.desc: Quickly lifts enemies into the air and then hurls them down with conviction. Enemies who succumb to this power have a chance to spawn a Health Sphere.

name: Octavia Prime
description: Strike up a symphony of destruction with the mistress of music, Octavia, in her grandest and most spectacular form. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: Octavia creates musical masterpieces from the Mandachord affixed to her arms that empowers her abilities. Casting any ability will inspire Octavia and nearby allies with her music, granting the Inspiration buff that replenishes 1 energy per second for 30 seconds. Allies within 15 meters will receive the Inspiration buff.

first.name: Mallet
first.desc: Rhythmically beats damage into nearby enemies and draws their fire. Damage inflicted on the Mallet increases its lethality.

second.name: Resonator
second.desc: Launches a rollerball that charms foes to follow it. Combines with the Mallet to create a roving ball of sonic destruction.

third.name: Metronome
third.desc: Grants buffs to those who consistently perform actions in time to Octavia’s music. Timed jumps offer the Vivace speed buff. Crouching on the beat grants cloaking with the Nocturne buff. Firing rhythmically bestows Opera multishot buff. Timed melee swings give the Forte damage buff.

fourth.name: Amp
fourth.desc: Draws power from the decibel level of sound in the area and uses it to amplify a damage buff for Octavia and her allies. It also doubles the damage and range of nearby Mallets.

name: Revenant Prime
description: The lost one rises. Wield the essence of the Eidolon as you wield Revenant Prime’s power.

passive.description: Harnessing the essence of Eidolons, Revenant is immune to the Magnetic night waters of the Plains of Eidolon. Additionally, when his Shield depletes, Revenant emits a 100 damage radial Blast that knocks down enemies within 7.5m. There is a max 75% Damage Falloff at the edge of the blast's radius.

first.name: Enthrall
first.desc: Convert a target into a zealous thrall. Thralls turn on their allies and enthrall through damage. On death, they disintegrate into a damaging pillar of energy. The thrall horde remains under Revenant’s spell until this Ability runs out.

second.name: Mesmer Skin
second.desc: Become enveloped in Sentient energy, which redirects damage and stuns all those who dare attack. Stunned enemies can be Enthralled at no energy cost.

third.name: Reave
third.desc: Dash through enemies as a wall of Sentient energy, leeching shields and health from any encountered, enhanced for thralls.

fourth.name: Danse Macabre
fourth.desc: Erupt with a multitude of Eidolon energy beams and sweep a circle of death around Revenant. The beams will modify their Damage Type to target select defenses, while incoming damage is redirected back into the beams. Hold fire to boost Status Effects and Damage, at the cost of increased energy consumption. Thralls killed by this leave overshield pickups.

name: Rhino Prime
description: Takes Rhino's ground-shaking abilities to the next level with altered mod polarities that offer greater customization.

passive.description: If Rhino falls far enough to incur a Hard Landing, the ground impact will discharge a shockwave that deals Impact damage in a 6 meter area of effect and knocking down nearby enemies.

first.name: Rhino Charge
first.desc: Rhino charges towards a target, clobbering any in his path and goring his victim.

second.name: Iron Skin
second.desc: Rhino hardens his skin, insulating himself from all damage.

third.name: Roar
third.desc: Grants all nearby Warframes increased damage for a short duration.

fourth.name: Rhino Stomp
fourth.desc: Rhino stomps with force sufficient to disrupt time, tumbling enemies around him in stasis.

name: Saryn Prime
description: A golden blossom conceals deadly nectar. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: Status Effects inflicted by Saryn's weapons and abilities last 25% longer.

first.name: Spores
first.desc: Inflict a target with a pox of DmgCorrosiveSmall64.pngCorrosive spores. Spread spores to nearby enemies by destroying them or killing their host. The longer the Spore spreads, its damage will increase.

second.name: Molt
second.desc: Shedding her skin like a snake, Saryn leaves a decoy behind to draw fire from enemies.

third.name: Toxic Lash
third.desc: While active, attacks deal additional Toxin damage; this effect is doubled for melee strikes. Instantly burst spores when attacking afflicted enemies.

fourth.name: Miasma
fourth.desc: Releases a poisonous miasma that deals Viral damage to enemies in range. Foes afflicted by spores are more susceptible to the mist.

name: Titania Prime
description: Tempting and terrifying, this is Titania in her ultimate form.

passive.description: Frolicking and fluttering about, Titania passively possesses +25% Bullet Jump and Rolling distance. Casting her abilities rejuvenates Titania and her allies within 15 meters, granting them the Upsurge buff which regenerates 4 Health points per second for 20 seconds.

first.name: Spellbind
first.desc: Enemies fumble their weapons as they tumble into the air. Nearby allies become immune to Status Effects.

second.name: Tribute
second.desc: Cycle through and extract one of the four Buffs when cast on an enemy. Thorns reduces incoming damage. Dust degrades enemy accuracy. Full Moon increases companion damage. Entangle slows enemies within range.

third.name: Lantern
third.desc: Create a swarm of razorflies that transform an enemy into an irresistible floating beacon, attracting witless comrades and finally exploding.

fourth.name: Razorwing
fourth.desc: Shrink down and take flight, while razorflies attack nearby enemies.

name: Trinity Prime
description: Become the bastion that defends allies using powerful healing abilities with Trinity Prime. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: Revive fallen allies 25% faster and from 50% farther away.

first.name: Well of Life
first.desc: Create a well of life on an enemy. Allies will gain health when damaging the target.

second.name: Energy Vampire
second.desc: Allies will gain energy over time when enemies are marked with Energy Vampire.

third.name: Link
third.desc: Any damage taken while Link is active will be channeled to a nearby enemy.

fourth.name: Blessing
fourth.desc: Restore the health and shields of allies within Trinity's Affinity aura while giving them some damage immunity.

name: Valkyr Prime
description: A proud fighter emerges unscarred by time or malice.

passive.description: Valkyr is nimble, able to recover from knockdown 50% faster and is immune to Hard Landings, landing with no touchdown delay.

first.name: Rip Line
first.desc: Valkyr hurls forth a hook. If it hits an enemy, she pulls them to her. If it hits terrain, she pulls herself to the hook's location.

second.name: Warcry
second.desc: Valkyr lets out a rallying cry that bolsters her allies melee speed while slowing down nearby enemies.

third.name: Paralysis
third.desc: Valkyr unleashes her shields, stunning and damaging enemies around her.

fourth.name: Hysteria
fourth.desc: Valkyr is imbued with energy and becomes a ball of vicious rage, capable of unleashing a torrent of deadly claw attacks on unsuspecting foes.

name: Vauban Prime
description: Transform the battlefield into a weapon with this gilded tactician. Features unique mod polarities for extended customization.

passive.description: An inventor by nature, the process of creation necessitates demolition and deconstruction. Vauban inflicts 25% extra damage with his weapons and abilities, against enemies that are incapacitated and unable to move.

first.name: Tesla Nervos
first.desc: Deploy a roller drone that attaches itself to enemies and delivers bursts of arcing electricity to anything in the immediate area.

second.name: Minelayer
second.desc: Cycle through four deployable mines: Tether Coil, Flechette Orb, Vector Pad and Overdriver.

third.name: Photon Strike
third.desc: Drop a targeting beacon that calls in a devastating laser artillery strike.

fourth.name: Bastille
fourth.desc: Erect a containment field to capture enemies and suspended them in stasis, stripping their armor. Hold to collapse all Bastilles into a single damaging vortex.

name: Volt Prime
description: A glorious warrior from the past, Volt Prime features the same abilities as Volt, but with unique mod polarities for greater customization.

passive.description: Traveling along the ground between Volt's attacks (by walking, running, or sliding) will build up static energy, adding bonus Electricity damage toward Volt's next weapon attack or ability cast.

first.name: Shock
first.desc: Launches a shocking projectile. It stuns and deals high damage to a single target and chains damage to nearby enemies.

second.name: Speed
second.desc: Volt energizes his body and nearby Warframes, giving them increased speed and dexterity for a short time.

third.name: Electric Shield
third.desc: Volt deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.

fourth.name: Discharge
fourth.desc: Paralyze nearby hostiles with a damaging electric charge, this also shocks approaching enemies.

name: Wukong Prime
description: This is Wukong, the enduring, the swift. Everybody's got something to hide, Tenno. Except Wukong.

passive.description: Wukong has learned five techniques to avoid death whenever he takes fatal damage. Wukong will be randomly allowed 3 of these techniques per mission to avoid death 3 times. Each technique will make Wukong avoid entering bleedout upon taking fatal damage, invulnerable for 2 seconds, restore 50% health, and provide a unique buff.

first.name: Celestial Twin
first.desc: Shedding part of himself, Wukong creates a twin to fight by his side. Attack at range and the twin will melee, pull a blade and the twin will lay down covering fire. Use again to command the twin to attack a target with increased damage.

second.name: Cloud Walker
second.desc: Evaporate into a cloud of mist and float through the battlefield, dazing any enemy encountered, while healing Wukong and his twin.

third.name: Defy
third.desc: Wukong and his twin become invulnerable and defy enemies to attack. All damage is captured, stored, and dealt back in a single furious strike of Wukong's staff. Bonus Armor is then granted relative to the damage captured.

fourth.name: Primal Fury
fourth.desc: Summon the Iron Staff and unleash fury.

name: Zephyr Prime
description: Take to the skies with this golden bird of destruction.

passive.description: Zephyr moves faster and falls slower while airborne. Also gain 150% Critical Hit chance with weapons while airborne.

first.name: Tail Wind
first.desc: Hold while airborne to hover Zephyr with reduced movement. From the air, tap to dash forward, or aim down to dive bomb enemies below.

second.name: Airburst
second.desc: Launch a burst of massively dense air. Hold to send enemies flying, tap to pull them toward the burst. Damage increases per enemy hit.

third.name: Turbulence
third.desc: Creates a wind shield around Zephyr, redirecting all incoming projectiles.

fourth.name: Tornado
fourth.desc: Create deadly tornadoes that seek out and engulf enemies. Tornadoes deal the elemental damage type they absorb the most. Shoot enemies engulfed in Tornadoes to do additional damage.
